title: Soujuu Senshi Psychic Wars (Psychic Wars)
synopsis: Ukyo Rettsu, a surgeon, treats a mysterous old woman for a mysterious "cancer." The growth turns out to be a messenger from the ancient past of Japan heralding a demonic invasion of the Earth. Ukyo must go back in time and fight the race of ancient demons.
staff: [['Imazawa, Tetsuo', ['Director']], ['Wolskel, John', ['Script']], ['Hayama, Junichi', ['Key Animation']], ['Suda, Masami', ['Animation Director', ' Key Animation', ' Character Design']]]
